attributes.action: scrap postal charges to bfpo addresses in war zone areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
our troops do an exceptional job and it brings a little comfort to them when they recieve mail and parcels from home.
Not all troops are on direct supply routes and rely on what families and support groups send, not only from a practical but also emotional standpoint. This  also is a disadvantage to those families who, for whatever reason, are not in a position financially to send mail,parcels to their loved ones serving their country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
